titleStmt.title: Aphorismes of Christian religion: or, a verie compendious abridgement of M. I. Calvins Institutions set forth in short sentences methodically by M. I. Piscator: and now Englished according to the authors third and last edition, by H. Holland.
Institutio Christianae religionis. English. Abridgments
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
Piscator, Johannes, 1546-1625.
Holland, Henry, 1555 or 6-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richard Field and Robert Dexter, and are to be sold in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Brasen serpent,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Brasen serpent
